data.comment: Nottingham kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Nottingham kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Nottingham have got their heads in front thanks to a Ryan Yates strike.
Rudy Gestede (Middlesbrough) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Goal! Lewis Wing gives Middlesbrough a 2-1 lead in Middlesbrough.
Darren England blows to end the first-half.
Middlesbrough have kicked-off the second half at Riverside.
Sabri Lamouchi is making the team's first substitution at Riverside with Adama Diakhaby replacing Alfa Semedo.
Joao Carvalho is replacing Sammy Ameobi for Nottingham at Riverside.
Ryan Colin Shotton (Middlesbrough) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sabri Lamouchi (Nottingham) is making a third substitution, with John Bostock replacing Ryan Yates.
The home team replace Lewis Wing with George Saville.
Lewis Grabban is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Djed Spence is on a sub for Marcus Tavernier for Middlesbrough.
That's full-time at Riverside. The final score is 2-2.
At Riverside, [10] has been yellow-carded for the [5].
